query:
SELECT t.id, t.customerId, t.type, t.amount, t.description, t.createdAt, c.email 
FROM customer_transactions t
JOIN customers c ON t.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'fcokelrihbrito@gmail.com' AND t.type = 'referral_bonus'
ORDER BY t.createdAt DESC
